overview:
Cortney Woodruff is an American Entrepreneur and Founder of Trainersvault.com. He currently attends IESE Business School in Barcelona, Spain. At the age of 24 he is the third youngest student in IESE’s aspiring graduating class of 2013.

Cortney is planning to launch Trainersvault.com, an online platform that will give athletes and parents a more efficient way to connect with private sports instructors across the world, during the first quarter of 2012.

Before moving to Barcelona to attend business school, Cortney served as a Research Analyst at IronView Capital in Ridgeland, Mississippi.
